cause.description:
Kayla Dawe Hayes from ST JEAN DE BREBEUF SECONDARY SCHOOL was in a terrible car crash and inured her neck. Please help support this group so no long term effects happen to kayla. your neck is a very important part in your body, if it breaks.. she could be paralyzed for life.
1. we dont want kayla to be paralyzed
2. She is a nice girl
3. She needs our help
cause.mission: raise money to help kayla survive from her fractured neck..protect her from any physical danger
cause.name: Help KAYLA HAYES heal Her Neck!!!
